name: The Joy of Painting with Blob Ross
name_original: The Joy of Painting with Blob Ross
description:
A game for the GMTK 2019 Game Jam - Only One

You control the single-celled amoeba Blob Ross on his quest to paint the world!

Click and drag to move Blob Ross around the screen.

Wrap him around happy little creatures and release the mouse to teach them how to paint!

Game design and programming - Mystical Pidgeon

Art design and assets - GameTinker

Audio - https://freesfx.co.uk/

Theming - 1 button controls, 1 ever-expanding level, and you absorb enemies into one large blob.
